head.title: Studying Referentiality in Frank O'Hara's Poetry

body.h1: Studying Referentiality in Frank O'Hara's Poetry
body.div: For this project, we will delve into Frank O'Hara's poetry. If you're not from 1950s or 1960s Manhattan, you probably have a lot to research (like I did) when you read his poetry. This site is dedicated to the uncovering of O'Hara's references, as well as how those references relate to each other and O'Hara's poetry.
